typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		loan_id as integer,
		account_id as integer,
		date as string,
		amount as integer,
		duration as integer,
		payments as decimal(10,0),
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dbo.loan.csv']) ~> LoanData
source(output(
		account_sk as integer,
		alternate_account_id as integer,
		district_key as integer,
		frequency as string,
		datekey as integer,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> AccountDW
DerivedColumns, AccountDW lookup(account_id == AccountDW@alternate_account_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(alternate_account_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
LoanData derive(insertDate = currentTimestamp(),
		updateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		loan_sk as integer,
		alternate_loan_id as integer,
		account_key as integer,
		date as date,
		amount as integer,
		duration as integer,
		payments as decimal(7,2),
		status as string,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		current_flag as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
